home.headerTitle: Your CHUV schedules, now digital and always at your fingertips
home.headerText:
No more lost or scattered papers! With our tool, your schedules become digital, accessible on your phone or computer.

Everything happens locally on your device: no data is transferred over the Internet, your information remains fully private and secure.

The ICS format – the standard for digital calendars – lets you easily view your shifts and duties, and integrate them directly into your usual calendars.
home.stepsTitle: From paper to your digital calendar in 3 simple steps
home.step1Text: Enter your CHUV shifts quickly, without Internet connection and with complete security.
home.step2Text: Your paper schedule becomes an ICS file, compatible with Google Calendar, Outlook or iCal, available anywhere, even offline.
home.step3Text: Your shifts are always accessible on all your devices. Check your schedule whenever and wherever you want, without searching through paper sheets.
home.ctaSubtitle: Ready to save time and say goodbye to paper?
